email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to charter a vessel for a shipment of 150,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CFR terms. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for a laycan starting around October 10?

Best regards,
James Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER, which has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 300m. The initial freight quote is USD 22.50 per metric tonne. The laycan can be adjusted to October 10-15. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 22.50 seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider revising it to USD 21.00 per metric tonne? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the vessel's performance history?

Best regards,
James Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

We can revise the freight rate to USD 21.50 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day. MV OCEAN TRADER has an excellent performance record, with no incidents in the past five years. Please let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the revised offer. We accept the freight rate of USD 21.50 per metric tonne and the demurrage rate of USD 20,000 per day. Please proceed with the booking for the laycan October 10-15.

Best regards,
James Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

The booking is confirmed. We will send the final documents shortly. Thank you for your business.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
